rules.name: No spam
rules.description: No promotional content, affiliate links, or repetitive posts.

rules.name: Be respectful
rules.description: No personal attacks, harassment, or hate speech.

rules.name: Stay on topic
rules.description: Posts must be related to project management, team collaboration, or productivity.

rules.name: No self-promotion
rules.description: No excessive self-promotion. Share tools only if directly relevant to a discussion.

rules.name: Original content
rules.description: Do not plagiarize or repost others' content without attribution.
